content: If I create page content using an XML file, and create headings like <h3>My heading</h3>. then the anchor link that is created seems to include the content that follows the heading. Is there a specific way to do this? The problem does not appear using markdown - eg ### My Heading works fine

The anchor name that appears before the heading needs to have a space inside it. I.e.
<a name="foo"> </a><!-- Note the space between start and end tags --> <h3>My heading</h3> <p>Some stuff</p>
I was just putting in the heading - so I need to explicitly add the anchor tag?
